attributes.action: This Petition is about attacks on our computers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when an attacker tries to enter your computer via the ports,it is shown and so is the providers IP address.what we are asking for is the right to find out what internet provider these people are using,and report them.We have no way of finding the provider,and it is wrong to let this carry on,it also costs the country hundreds of thousands of pounds a year.Internet providers should be listed.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
